text.section: When an application for certificate of approval is filed, the Secretary shall hold a public hearing on the application.

section.section: The Secretary shall publish a notice of the hearing within 60 days of receipt of the completed application.

text.section:
The notice shall be published at least twice in 1 week:
In 2 newspapers published in the county where the private group home is to be located;
If only 1 newspaper is published in that county, in that newspaper; or
If a newspaper is not published in that county, any newspaper with substantial circulation in that county.
